definition: a backless sandal held to the foot by a strip of fabric between the big toe and the second toe; also known as flip-flops
details:
noun
- a backless sandal held to the foot by a strip of fabric between the big toe and the second toe; also known as flip-flops
= example: a backless sandal held to the foot by a strip of fabric between the big toe and the second toe; also known as flip-flops
= synonyms: flip-flop
- minimal clothing worn by stripteasers
= synonyms: G-string
- leather strip that forms the flexible part of a whip
= synonyms: lash
- a thin strip of leather
- underpants resembling a G-string
